Opium and the Kung Fu Master
Lung Ti, Te-Lo Mai, Leanne Liu, Kuan Tai Chen, Phillip Ko, Kuan-chung Ku, Kwok Kuen Chan, Hoi Sang Lee, Tau Wan Yue, Chia Tang, Shen Chan

Leader of the Ten Kwangtung Tigers, Tieh Chiao-san works with his kung fu students to protect his village from crime. But when an opium dealer starts to ruin the town, Tieh Chiao-san struggles to fight back, thanks to his growing opium addiction.
